title: The Quiet Valor of Romeo Price

story.text: Romeo Price, a 74-year-old retired professor, discovers an ancient crochet needle engraved with mystical symbols at a local market. He buys it, thinking it will be a great addition to his crocheting tools.
While crocheting a scarf, the needle glows, and Romeo is suddenly able to hear the thoughts of his neighbors. Surprised, he realizes he can use this power to help them solve their quiet struggles.
Romeo hears a neighbor worrying about losing her cat. Using his new powers, he follows the faint thoughts of the cat, finding it stuck in a nearby tree and safely rescues it.
He discovers another neighbor struggling with loneliness. Romeo decides to invite the neighbor over for a crochet lesson, providing companionship and teaching a new hobby.
The powers of the needle begin to take a toll on Romeo; he feels exhausted from the constant barrage of thoughts. He contemplates putting the needle away for good.
Romeo uses the needle for one last time to help a young couple communicate their unspoken issues, leading them to reconcile and understand each other better.
Realizing the importance of his own peace, Romeo decides to retire the mystical needle, locking it away. He spends his day relaxing, crocheting without any interruptions.

moral: With great power comes not only great responsibility but also a need for self-care.
